page.title: 14Episcopal and Baptist Church
page.content:
{ St Columba's Episcopal Church
The church was built in{1885,}100 years ago and is still there today. The present priest in charge is the {Rev. Canon Arthur Wheatley. The church is in full Communion with all other branches of the Anglican Church. The doors are open daily for private prayer.
************************************** { The Baptist Church
The church was built in{1835}on the site of a gravel pit. {Peter Grant}was the preacher who had it built despite considerable opposition. It was rebuilt in 1895. The present minister is{Rev. {Roberts..
